pullrequest.title: Feature System Part 7: Features for programmatic construction of objects

content.raw: I added a failing test \([de6ea31](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/commits/de6ea31e2870a4f020eefe0ae3abc161204d3f16?at=sdf_component)\) that uses `ForwardStep`. The test world is a sphere falling and a static box on which the sphere is supposed to land. The sphere instead goes through the box. Running the world in gazebo with DART works as expected.
content.html: I added a failing test (de6ea31) that uses ForwardStep. The test world is a sphere falling and a static box on which the sphere is supposed to land. The sphere instead goes through the box. Running the world in gazebo with DART works as expected.
